message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with vision-and-language grounding problems, which involve the integration of visual and textual modalities. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel module for integrating visual and textual features, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP), making cs.CL (Computation and Language) another likely category. The paper also evaluates its approach on two representative vision-and-language tasks, which involves machine learning and optimization, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely category. The paper also involves the use of semantic representations, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (AI), making cs.AI another likely category. Finally, the paper involves the alignment of visual and textual features, which falls under the category of information retrieval (IR), making cs.IR a possible category.
